blogPost.excerpt: A comprehensive tool for ensuring that Applicant Tracking Systems (ATSs) and other automatic filtering systems can accurately read you CV and extract text from it. Your CV will only progress to a human reviewer if a machine can read it properly.
blogPost.body: A comprehensive tool for ensuring that Applicant Tracking Systems (ATSs) and other automatic filtering systems can accurately read you CV and extract text from it. Your CV will only progress to a human reviewer if a machine can read it properly.
blogPost.title: e-Read My CV - Test if machine can parse your CV and read its content
blogPost.author: Vlad  Grossman

localize.description: 一个全面的工具，确保申请人跟踪系统(ATS)和其他自动过滤系统能够准确地阅读你的简历并从中提取文本。只有当机器能够正确阅读您的简历时，您的简历才会提交给人工审核员。
localize.tagline: 测试机器是否能解析你的简历并读取其内容。

localize.description: 一個全面的工具，確保申請人跟蹤系統(ATS)和其他自動過濾系統能夠準確地閱讀你的簡歷並從中提取文本。只有當機器能夠正確閱讀您的簡歷時，您的簡歷纔會提交給人工審覈員。
localize.tagline: 測試機器是否能解析你的簡歷並讀取其內容。

next.excerpt: Focus on what matters, from small tasks to life goals: - Spend your time doing things and reaching your goals - Stop wasting your time classifying things or measuring productivity. Minimalist and delightful design. No sign up. No ads. No data collected.
next.title: Listed - The minimalist app for your to-dos & notes

localize.description: 专注于重要的事情，从小任务到人生目标。- 把时间花在做事情和实现目标上 不要再浪费时间去分类或衡量生产力了 简约而愉悦的设计。无需注册。没有广告。不收集数据。
localize.tagline: 为你的待办事项和笔记而设计的极简主义应用。

localize.description: 專注於重要的事情，從小任務到人生目標。- 把時間花在做事情和實現目標上 不要再浪費時間去分類或衡量生產力了 簡約而愉悅的設計。無需註冊。沒有廣告。不收集數據。
localize.tagline: 爲你的待辦事項和筆記而設計的極簡主義應用。
